comment: This app disgusting on purpose i swear to god i cant comment anything because everything is either misinformation or spam. This app is a joke. I live in fear that i'll lose my account and my pictures over this. You guys cant even make a simple social media platform work in the most basic ways, its on purpose at this point. With all the global outages, everyone being logged out, its insane and disgusting. I record moments using instagram, and it gets the "error" message. Losing it forever. Why???
scenarios: Commenting feature: User is unable to comment because everything they try to post is flagged as either misinformation or spam.
Account and photo safety: User fears losing their account and photos due to concerns with the app's reliability.
Recording moments: User attempts to record moments using Instagram but encounters an "error" message, resulting in losing the recorded content forever.
key sentence: Recording moments: User attempts to record moments using Instagram but encounters an "error" message, resulting in losing the recorded content forever.
the function of activity: This activity involves managing user profiles and interactions, creating and editing content, exploring media, and adjusting privacy and notification settings on a social media platform.
